infos.value: Halt.
...Where are we?
It's now part of Rundall, though it used to be Lykeros territory, near the border of Hourne.
I've heard that slightly farther up ahead lies the entrance to a mining tunnel.
And the Church of the Crystal followers are repeatedly carrying out illegal mining operations there...?
Shake off your nerves. This is a simple mission.
Y-you're right.
However, why the gun...?
You must be aware that guns are disdained as cowards' weapons within «Crucium».
It's in admiration of you, Lu'Cia.
Of me...?
That's right.
So now we have two gunners... In admiration of Lu'Cia, huh?
Y-yes.
Hmph. A sensible decision.
It suits a coward such as yourself to hide behind us waving that toy around.
...Toy?
Anyone can see that.
Lord Jayden makes use of them simply for sport.
Understand? Battle belongs to us, the close-combat division. And we won't ever be passing that baton on to the likes of you two.
He doesn't really mean that.
...No. I think he does.
The commander is stubborn and certainly has an unaccommodating side to him.
But his loyalty to Rundall is unwavering, no matter the circumstances.
He will do anything to make Lord Jayden the king of this land.
Even if it means throwing his own dignity to the winds.
Which is why...
That much I understand, Deputy Commander. In fact, that's precisely why I came to «Crucium».
«Crucium» is the preeminent close-combat division. I believe it to be as formidable a force as the first division, «Sonitus».
However...
Please, go on.
I do not believe it to be flawless in all aspects.
So, you mean to say...that «Crucium» could become even stronger?
Yes. With me present...
You're quite confident, aren't you? But you must know that the road ahead is a tough one.
For it is more difficult to change an existing organization than to create a new one from scratch.
I am aware. Everything is for Lord Jayden.
If it will lead to Lord Jayden becoming the king of this land, then I am prepared to accept anything.
...Yes. But you mustn't throw your life away.
Lord Jayden would be saddened if you were to do such a thing.
Understood.
The commander is growing tired of waiting.
Let us move on. The mining tunnel is just up ahead.
